About.p1: Cybersecurity is a crucial part of the internet and is a growing concern for many users and businesses. Attacks can strike at any moment, devastating individuals and organisations. That's why we created Xanzhu.
About.p2: Our mission is to become a leading source for information and knowledge on security, privacy, and accessibility.
About.p3: We want to provide a space for technology lovers, as well as average consumers and business owners, to gain insight into how to protect themselves online.
About.p4: Knowing how to protect yourself or your business is important. Privacy and security should be a top priority.
About.p5: We are new and will likely make a few mistakes. But we're passionate about making the internet a safer place, and we hope you'll join us in developing the next standard of security practices and guidelines.
About.description: Xanzhu.com - Your cybersecurity hub. Protecting you online with valuable insights on security, privacy, and accessibility. Join us!
About.title: About

PP.title: Privacy Policy
PP.section-one: We value privacy and respect the privacy of those who visit our website. No identifiable information is stored or accessed without your permission to ensure that we do not infringe upon your privacy.
PP.section-two: Because our site contains links to third-party websites, we cannot prevent tracking outside of our domain.
PP.section-three: Usage data that your browser provides (User-Agent), includes IP addresses, browsers and devices used. This data is used for metrics and server communications.

hero.subhead: Explore trends, tools, and techniques driving technology forward—from safeguarding data to       redefining the       digital world.
hero.heading: Privacy and Security for the Modern Web

hero.title: Security Toolkit
hero.description: Comprehensive collection of free security tools, educational resources, and reporting platforms to help protect your digital presence.

search.noResults: Oops, we couldn't find anything, please try again.

explain.phishing: Tools and resources to help identify, avoid, and report phishing attempts and suspicious websites.
explain.network: Essential tools for monitoring network traffic, detecting vulnerabilities, and securing your connections.
explain.malware: Free tools and platforms for analyzing suspicious files, detecting malware, and maintaining system security.

reporting.securityheaders: Analyze a website’s HTTP security headers for vulnerabilities
reporting.shodan: Search engine for discovering devices and systems exposed to the internet.
reporting.anyrun: Interactive malware analysis tool for analyzing and sharing results in real time.
reporting.hybrid: Free malware analysis platform for analyzing suspicious files and URLs
reporting.microsoft: Microsoft’s platform for reporting phishing and malicious URLs
reporting.google: Report suspicious websites to Google Safe Browsing for protection updates

tools.snort: Intrusion detection system for real-time traffic analysis and threat prevention.
tools.owaspzap: Open-source penetration testing tool for identifying web application vulnerabilities
tools.wireshark: Network protocol analyzer for monitoring and troubleshooting network traffic.
tools.sandboxie: Tool for running applications in an isolated sandbox environment.
tools.clamav: Open-source antivirus engine for detecting malware and malicious files.
tools.malwarebytes: Malware protection and removal software for home and business use.
tools.virustotal: Online scanner for analyzing files and URLs for malware and suspicious content.
tools.openphish: Automatic phishing detection and intelligence feed service.
tools.urlvoid: Tool to check a website’s reputation and detect malicious activities.
tools.apwg: Anti-Phishing Working Group offering resources to combat phishing globally
tools.phishtank: Community-powered database for identifying and reporting phishing websites
